command.name: virtual
command.abstract: configure a BGP session as virtual

description.p: This command configures one BGP neighbor as "virtual". A virtual peer is used to feed C-BGP with real BGP messages (see bgp router peer recvbgp_router_peer_recv). A virtual peer does not maintain a BGP session with another BGP router. Moreover, the router will not send BGP messages to a virtual peer.
